text: Nidda is a town in Wetteraukreis in Hesse, Germany. It is on the river Nidda and is about 40 km northeast of Frankfurt am Main. == Districts == Nidda has districts: Unter-Widdersheim, Ober-Widdersheim, Borsdorf, Harb, Bad- Salzhausen, Geiß-Nidda, Ulfa, Stornfels, Eichelsdorf, Ober-Schmitten, Unter- Schmitten, Kohden, Nidda, Michelnau, Fauerbach, Wallernhausen, Schwickartshausen, Unter-Lais and Ober-Lais. == Mayors == * since 2022: Thorsten Eberhard (CDU) * 2010–2022: Hans-Peter Seum * 1995–2009: Lucia Puttrich (CDU) * 1989–1995: Helmut Jung (SPD) * 1961–1989: Wilhelm Eckhardt (SPD) * 1949–1961: August Ludwig Böcher * 1910–1924: Ludwig Erk * 1899–1910: Hermann Roth * 1898–1899: Wilhelm Erk == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Wetteraukreis
title: Nidda, Hesse
